title: Blood Vengeance
description: Laughter and screams echo from the abandoned apartment downstairs.Â Grey and rotting ghosts of murdered girls claw each other in sick imitation of their deaths.For twenty years, the raging spirit of the slain San Francisco Ripper has continued to torment his victims. Now time is running out, not just for Brennan and his friends, but for the souls of the dead girls, trapped for all these years with their murderer.
author: Michael Schutz-Ryan
